translation.en: [Bea] Jessie? -Jess, are you okay? Easy. -[Jessie whimpering]
translation.ja: ジェシー 落ち着いて

translation.en: You're just having a dream.
[panting] There was this thing, like a dark thing, and it was coming at me.
translation.ja: 真っ黒な何かに襲われそうになった

translation.en: It's just a dream.
Am I losing it, Bea?
translation.ja: 私 頭が変になってるの？

translation.en: -You think I'm losing it, don't you? -No, I don't think that.
translation.ja: 私 頭が変になってるの？ そんなことない

translation.en: Honestly.
-Just go back to sleep. Yeah? -[panting]
It's okay.
[Jessie] Bea.
Bea, wake up. Bea.
Bea, wake up.
translation.ja: ねえ 起きてったら

translation.en: Happy birthday!
Wow, you're so close to me.
[Bea] Do you want some tea?
What are you doing?
[Jessie] I got you a birthday present.
I know you said money was tight this year, but I couldn't resist.
translation.ja: 無駄使いはダメだけどもらってほしい

translation.en: Ah, look, I'm 17 now. Maybe we don't need to do the invisible present thing.
translation.ja: もう17歳よプレゼントごっこは勘弁して

translation.en: What invisible present thing?
Okay. Fine.
What is it?
Well, it's pretty obvious to everyone you're desperate to find a boyfriend.
translation.ja: どうしても恋人が欲しそうだから...

translation.en: -I don't want to find a boyfriend. -It's French perfume.
translation.ja: そんなことない フランスの香水よ

translation.en: Just two sprays, make any man want to make sweet love to you. Ugh.
translation.ja: ２回振ればどんな人も優しくしてくれる

translation.en: -Almost too sweet, if anything. -Look, I don't…
translation.ja: ２回振ればどんな人も優しくしてくれる ちょっとやめて

translation.en: I am not desperate for a boyfriend, I just…
translation.ja: 恋人なんか望んでない

translation.en: -I just don't have time for men. -[laughing] My God, Bea!
translation.ja: そんな暇ないわ 信じられない

translation.en: You're 17 now. You should be knee-deep in shenanigans at your age. Ankle-deep at least.
translation.ja: 17歳なら 男の子とイチャイチャして当然なのに

translation.en: Where's the shenanigans? I don't see any shenanigans.
translation.ja: イチャつく相手さえいない

translation.en: Look, stop saying "shenanigans." Oh, my God!
translation.ja: “イチャつく”って繰り返さないで

translation.en: It's my birthday, and I'm banning the word "shenanigans."
translation.ja: 今日は それを禁句にする

translation.en: That's what I want for my present.
Well, you're not keeping the perfume as well.
translation.ja: それなら香水を返して

translation.en: [Bea] Wait a minute.
Where's Billy and Spike?
Billy, we shouldn't be here, mate.
translation.ja: ビリー やっぱり帰ろう

translation.en: I'm too pretty to be here.
I stand out a mile. My handsomeness is making me a target.
translation.ja: 僕はハンサムだから狙われやすい

translation.en: Just don't make eye contact with anyone.
translation.ja: 誰とも目を合わせるな

translation.en: Why would you say that? Now I'm just staring at people. I can't not make eye contact.
translation.ja: 変な助言するから人の目を見ちまうだろ

translation.en: Billy.
Billy, let's just go.
William Chisup versus Tam Bibby!
translation.ja: 次はビリー･チザップとタム･ビビーの対決だ

translation.en: -[man] Yeah, go on then, take it. -On him!
Billy.
I think you should turn around.
Spike!
Just relax, would ya?
I've seen him.
I don't care how big he…
Shit.
-[man] Catch it! -[all cheering]
A gift from the Marquess of Bath, Your Highness.
translation.ja: バース侯爵から誕生日の贈り物です

translation.en: Happy birthday, sir.
translation.ja: おめでとうございます

translation.en: Cups.
I'm so glad that word of my fondness for crockery has reached the ears of His Lordship.
translation.ja: 僕の陶器好きが先方に伝わっていたようだ

translation.en: Daimler… [sighs] I've decided what I'd like for my birthday from my mother.
translation.ja: 誕生日だから母に頼んでほしい

translation.en: I wish to leave the palace.
I'm afraid Her Majesty won't allow that, sir.
After you went over on your ankle, Dr. Clark advised that you move around as little as possible.
translation.ja: 足首を傷めているので動かないようにと⸺

translation.en: Make sure there's no lasting damage.
Tell my mother that I wish…
that I need to leave the palace.
translation.ja: どうしても外出したい

translation.en: Just for one day.
It is my birthday and that is all I wish for.
translation.ja: 誕生日の唯一の望みだ

translation.en: When I asked to leave the palace, I meant that I wanted to see the city.
translation.ja: 街を歩きたかったのに

translation.en: The city is a hard place, sir.
It's not for those of a…
delicate constitution.
You know, I could've taken him.
Billy, that guy could do shits bigger than you.
translation.ja: あんたよりずっと大きかった

translation.en: -You promised me no more fighting. -I never promised you anything.
translation.ja: 戦わない約束は？ してない

translation.en: Put a shirt on!
-Why? -Because…
you'll catch a cold, and when you have a cold you're even more of a bellend.
translation.ja: 風邪をひかれたら厄介だもの

translation.en: It's not like I was doing it for myself, is it?
translation.ja: 俺自身のためじゃない

translation.en: She's always been… unusual, Bea, but this is something else.
translation.ja: ジェシーは変わった子だけど今回は いつもと違う

translation.en: She needs help. And doctors cost money.
translation.ja: 医者に診せるにはカネが要る

translation.en: Hudson cornered me yesterday. We're two months late for the rent. If we don't get the money together pronto, we're out.
translation.ja: それに家賃が遅れてると大家にどやされた

translation.en: It's nearly winter. We'd freeze to death.
translation.ja: 冬に追い出されたら死ぬぞ

translation.en: Look, I know we don't like to talk about it, but what about a workhouse?
translation.ja: イヤだろうけど救貧院がある

translation.en: What did you say?
I was just trying to find ways--
Don't talk to me about the workhouse, Spike.
translation.ja: 救貧院の話はしないで

translation.en: You don't know about the workhouse. You weren't there like the rest of us.
translation.ja: 私たちと違ってあんたは何も知らない

translation.en: Come on, Bea.
We've been through worse than this. It's like you said, we survived the workhouse, for God's sake.
translation.ja: 俺たちは救貧院だって生き延びただろ

translation.en: Hmm. Remember when we lived with that eel lady?
translation.ja: ウナギ女とも暮らした

translation.en: No one should ever have to live within three feet of an eel.
translation.ja: 二度と近づきたくない

translation.en: [Spike] I still dream about it. I dream that I'm in a bath, and one of her eels are in there with me.
translation.ja: 僕は今でもウナギと風呂に入る夢を見る

translation.en: -All of a sudden, it just finds its way-- -Yeah, all right, mate. We get it.
translation.ja: そいつが突然... その話はもういい

translation.en: Look, Spike's point is we got through it.
translation.ja: 今まで生き抜いたように...

translation.en: I can't lose her.
translation.ja: あの子を失いたくない

translation.en: She's the only family I've got.
Well, she's not the only family you got.
translation.ja: ジェシーだけじゃないだろ

translation.en: We're your family, too, aren't we?
Come on.
[sighs] Okay. So, how do we get some money?
Guys, she's gone.
translation.ja: おい ジェシーがいない

translation.en: -[Jessie] You knew it made monsters… -[Dr. Watson] Something's come to London.
translation.ja: 化け物に変える あれが街に来た

translation.en: [Daimler] This is his time.
[Dr. Watson] Something has come to London, girl.A darkness has entered this city.
translation.ja: 闇の悪魔がロンドンの街に紛れ込んだ

translation.en: -[Bea] Jess! -[gasps]
Where is it? The dark thing? Is it gone?
translation.ja: 闇は どこに行ったの？

translation.en: [Daimler] What on earth were you doing standing in the road, girl?
I should have you flogged.
Never mind that. What were you doing going so fast? You could've killed her.
translation.ja: あんなスピードじゃ死人が出る

translation.en: Young lady, how dare you speak to your betters in that manner.
translation.ja: 目上の人間に向かって無礼だ

translation.en: -My betters? -[Daimler] Hmm.
-My betters? -[Spike] Tell him!
[Bea] Just because you ride around in a fancy carriage and wear suits doesn't make you my better. Doesn't make you anyone's better.
translation.ja: 制服を着て馬車に乗る人が偉いとでも？

translation.en: -[Daimler] Now, listen here-- -No, you listen here, you prick!
translation.ja: それは... よく聞きなさい

translation.en: You may be used to bullying people and having them kiss your ass, but no one talks down to me.
translation.ja: 他の人は黙ってても私を見下したら承知しない

translation.en: So get back in your carriage and piss off to wherever you came from.
translation.ja: さっさと消えてちょうだい

translation.en: Go on, off you pop!
[Billy] Yeah! [Spike] Posh prick.
translation.ja: そうだ　上流階級め

translation.en: [Bea] Shh, it's okay.
She's been having these dreams for two weeks now.
You said ages ago that dreams is how it started with my mum.
translation.ja: 母も最初は夢に苦しんでた

translation.en: I remember you telling me.
-You said towards the end that-- -[Sister Anna] Bea.
translation.ja: 死ぬ前に... ジェシーは同じ目に遭わないわ

translation.en: What happened to your mum isn't gonna happen to Jessie.
translation.ja: ジェシーは同じ目に遭わないわ

translation.en: You're making connections that aren't there.
Why is her grave the only one that never has any flowers on it?
translation.ja: 〝ビーとジェシーの母アリス〞 母のお墓は いつも花がない 母のお墓は いつも花がない

translation.en: Guess no one else loved her apart from me and Jessie.
I'm sure that isn't true.
What would you say if I stole some flowers off another grave and put 'em on my mum's?
translation.ja: 他のお墓から花を盗んで飾ったら？

translation.en: I'd say congratulations. You're officially going to hell.
translation.ja: おめでとうあなたは地獄に落ちるわ

translation.en: My door is always open.
What am I gonna do, Mum?
Sister?
There's no need to be afraid.
I'm a doctor.
Come any closer and you'll need a doctor.
translation.ja: 近づいたら病院送りよ

translation.en: My business partner and I
have been watching you from our apartment on Baker Street.
translation.ja: ベイカー街で君たちを見てた

translation.en: We want something from you.
I have money.
I need a room.
Tell Hudson to put it on my tab.
Take a seat.
What happens in this room will remain between us.
translation.ja: 今から話すことは口外無用だ

translation.en: Is that understood?
My business partner and I run a small detective agency. Our offices are here on Baker Street, 221B.
translation.ja: 私たちはベイカー街221Ｂで探偵事務所を営んでる

translation.en: However…
we are reputable men,
and as such do not have access to the more disreputable parts of London.
translation.ja: ロンドンの下流社会に入り込むことができない

translation.en: We need you to find information for us.
translation.ja: だから情報収集してほしい

translation.en: Should you be successful, you will receive generous compensation.
translation.ja: 成功報酬は惜しまない

translation.en: I'm listening.
And they say there's no such thing as miracles.
Four newborn babies have been stolen.
translation.ja: 赤ん坊が４人さらわれた

translation.en: We have no idea whether they're living or dead.
The most recent was last night. A baby in Bayswater was taken from a locked room.
translation.ja: 昨晩 ベイズウォーターでも１人さらわれた

translation.en: Windows locked from the inside. Cot on one side of the room, older sistersleeping in a bed on the other.
translation.ja: 窓には内側から鍵がかけられ姉も同じ部屋で寝てた

translation.en: Mother was awake downstairs during the disappearance. Confirmed no one left or entered the house.
translation.ja: 階下にいた母親は誰も出入りしてないと言う

translation.en: We found this beneath the crib.
Why aren't the police doing anything?
Since the disappearance, the daughter hasn't returned home.
translation.ja: その後 娘が家出してる

translation.en: Something is amiss.
However, as I said, locating errant teenagers is not something we have time for.
translation.ja: しかし私たちには不良娘を捜す暇がない

translation.en: That's where you and your friends come in.
The daughter's name is Susan Shipley. Repeat it back to me.
translation.ja: 娘の名前はスーザン･シプリー

translation.en: Susan Shipley.
If you want the money… you find her and you find out what she knows.
translation.ja: 報酬が欲しければ娘から情報を聞き出せ

translation.en: [Billy] This is a stupid idea.
A man follows you from a graveyard and asks you to help find someone involved in a kidnapping?
translation.ja: 誘拐事件の関係者を捜してほしいなんて

translation.en: -They're private detectives. -That's what he told you.
translation.ja: 探偵らしい どうだかね

translation.en: For all we know, this girl saw him take the baby. Now he wants to do her in.
translation.ja: そいつが犯人で目撃者を殺す気かも

translation.en: We have to find her and ask what she knows. -That's it. Easy money. -Is it?
translation.ja: 情報を聞き出せば報酬がもらえる

translation.en: 'Cause last I checked, there's four million people in London.
translation.ja: どうやって400万のロンドン市民から...

translation.en: -It's like looking for a-- -Found her!
translation.ja: どうやって400万のロンドン市民から... 見つけた

translation.en: She's staying above a cobblers on Brookwater Street in Clerkenwell.
translation.ja: クラーケンウェルの靴店の上だ

translation.en: How did you find her?
You know Pete McGregor, the fishing wire guy?
translation.ja: 漁師のピートを訪ねてみた

translation.en: Owed me a favor from the time I found his dog on Clapham Common. He used to live in Bayswater, so I said…
translation.ja: ヤツの犬を見つけて貸しがあったからね

translation.en: -Do you know Susan Shipley? -He said, "Nah, mate."
translation.ja: スーザンを？ “ベイズウォーターの知り合いは おばだけだ”

translation.en: "The only person I know down in Bayswater is me Auntie Aggie."
translation.ja: “ベイズウォーターの知り合いは おばだけだ”

translation.en: [Billy] You didn't find Pete McGregor's dog. You stole it when you were trying to impress that girl who loved animals.
translation.ja: 好きな子を口説くために彼の犬を盗んだくせに

translation.en: Look, the important thing is he got his dog back. All right?
translation.ja: だから ちゃんと返しただろ

translation.en: Anyway. Auntie Aggie's house, it smells like piss and biscuits.
translation.ja: おばさんの家はビスケット臭かったけど

translation.en: Two hours she had me in there, waffling on.
translation.ja: 我慢して話を聞いてたら男が入ってきた

translation.en: Then this big fella comes in who she said was the gardener.
translation.ja: 我慢して話を聞いてたら男が入ってきた あれは完全にデキてるね

translation.en: -But they was definitely banging. -Spike!
translation.ja: あれは完全にデキてるね スパイク

translation.en: I'm gonna need you to get to the point now, mate.
Yeah. So…
[high-pitched voice] "He's looking for a girlcalled Susan Shipley."
[deep voice] "The girl Luke Porter is courting?"
[in normal voice] And they told me Luke Porter is a member of Salaman's Bathhouse in Shoreditch.
translation.ja: ルークが通う公衆浴場を聞き出して

translation.en: To flush him out, I went into the changing rooms, loud, like…
translation.ja: 更衣室でヤツをあぶり出した

translation.en: Yeah, mate!
I'm sleeping with a bird from down here. She's gorgeous. Susan Shipley her name is.
translation.ja: スーザン･シプリーっていい女と寝てきた

translation.en: He comes out of the shower and he's completely naked.
translation.ja: ヤツは飛びかかってきたよ

translation.en: His wand is flapping all over the shop. It's very unbecoming.
translation.ja: アソコが丸出しでみっともなかった

translation.en: Mate. Calm your horses. I was looking for Sue. She could be in trouble.
translation.ja: 落ち着いて実は彼女に危険が迫ってる

translation.en: Yeah? [Spike] "She don't want to be found, you slag."
Have you ever heard of Edna Skiffins?
translation.ja: エドナ･スキフィンズは⸺

translation.en: Edna Skiffins got ten years in prison for obstructing an investigation.
translation.ja: 捜査を妨害して10年の実刑を食らった

translation.en: Do you want to end up like Edna Skiffins?
Who in the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth is Edna Skiffins?
translation.ja: エドナ･スキフィンズって一体 誰だ？

translation.en: I made her up, didn't I?
-And it worked? -Yeah.
Is any of this true?
My friends, you're looking at one Miss Susan Shipley of Bayswater.
translation.ja: では紹介しようスーザン･シプリーだ

translation.en: I don't have to talk to you. You're not police.
No, we're not.
The police aren't looking for your sister anymore.
translation.ja: 警察は もう動いてない

translation.en: I guess they don't care enough about families like yours.
You're lying.
Of course they're looking for her.
No one's looking for her apart from the guys who asked us to talk to you.
translation.ja: 捜してるのは私を雇った探偵だけ

translation.en: Help them find her, Susan. Tell us what you know.
translation.ja: 助けるから知ってることを教えて

translation.en: That night… the night Laura went missing…
translation.ja: ローラがさらわれた夜⸺

translation.en: I snuck out and left the window open.
translation.ja: 窓を開けたまま 家を出た

translation.en: I wasn't thinking.
When I got back…
Laura was gone.
I closed the window because I knew Mom would be so mad.
translation.ja: ママが怒るから窓を閉めた

translation.en: It wasn't your fault, Sue.
translation.ja: あなたの責任じゃない

translation.en: Well, she didn't disappear into thin air. She was taken out of the window.
translation.ja: その子は窓からさらわれたんだね

translation.en: What, three floors up? Can't even get that high with a ladder.
translation.ja: でも３階まで届くハシゴなんかない

translation.en: There is something else. I thought I might have dreamt it, but for like…
translation.ja: もう１つ気になってることがある

translation.en: five nights in a row, I heard this…
scraping and cawing outside the window.
translation.ja: 窓の外で鳥の鳴き声がした

translation.en: It sounded like…
[Bea] Like what?
Jesus Christ!
-What the hell was that? -[cawing]
-[Bea] Are you all right? -[Susan] I'm okay.
-[cawing] -It's coming back. Run. Run!
Quick!
-[Billy] It's jammed! -[Bea] Billy, come on!
translation.ja: 開かない 何とかして

translation.en: [Bea] Got it.
Are you all right, Bumble?
[Spike] Bea?
Billy?
I'm so glad I found you.
Ever since I saw you the other day,
I haven't stopped… well…
translation.ja: あなたが頭から離れなかった

translation.en: thinking about you.
And what exactly have you been thinking about?
Why don't you let me show you?
I knew an excursion would leave you tired out, sir.
translation.ja: 外出して お疲れでしょう

translation.en: But in many ways I am glad we left the palace.
translation.ja: でも学習なさったのでは？

translation.en: You saw the type of people out there.
translation.ja: 街には野蛮人がいます

translation.en: I did indeed. [exhales]
You do understand, Your Majesty, that I don't keep you here because I take any pleasure from it.
translation.ja: 殿下を閉じ込めて楽しいわけではありません

translation.en: I do it because you have hemophilia.
If you hurt yourself, it could have extremely dire consequences.
translation.ja: ケガでもすれば大惨事です

translation.en: I'm not to be disturbed for a while. Under any circumstances.
translation.ja: １人にしてくれ今日は もう邪魔するな

translation.en: Good afternoon to you, sir.
This is a fine establishment you have here.
But I'm actually looking for another pub, The Duck and Quiver?
translation.ja: パブの“カモと矢筒”を探してるのですが

translation.en: But while I'm here, one pint of ale, please.
translation.ja: せっかくだから１杯ください

translation.en: Is this sufficient payment?
Yeah, yeah. That's the exact amount, mate.
You look like you could use a little assistance, young man.
translation.ja: どうやら困ってるようだね

translation.en: [chuckling] Yes, as a matter of fact, I really, really could. You see, I'm new to the city.
translation.ja: ええ 不慣れな街なのでどうしたものか考えてます

translation.en: -Gosh. -Ha'penny just to watch.
translation.ja: これは... ２ペンスくれたら癒やしてあげるわ

translation.en: Tuppence if you want me to relieve you.
translation.ja: ２ペンスくれたら癒やしてあげるわ

translation.en: I'm afraid there's been some sort of dreadful misunderstanding.
translation.ja: 僕は とんだ誤解を

translation.en: Welcome to London!
What do you want? Did the girl talk?
What the hell have you got us involved in?
Her eyes were ripped out of her head by birds.
translation.ja: 彼女は鳥に目をくり抜かれた

translation.en: Calm down.
Did the girl tell you anything before she died?
Her name was Susan.
You don't care, do you?
Not about Susan, not about the babies. You just care about solving the case and getting your commission from the police.
translation.ja: スーザンや赤ん坊より警察からの報酬が気になる？

translation.en: It doesn't matter anyway. We're out.
translation.ja: もういい私たちは手を引くわ

translation.en: We did what you asked us to.
Oh, you expect to be paid? For what, exactly?
translation.ja: 何に対して報酬を要求してる？

translation.en: You need to pay me.
Pay me, or by God, I will come back and smash every window in this shithole you call a home.
translation.ja: 払わないなら事務所の窓を全部割ってやる

translation.en: And you accuse me of being in it for the money.
translation.ja: カネの亡者は どっちだ？

translation.en: A girl is dead and four babies are missing.
translation.ja: 赤ん坊は行方不明のままだ

translation.en: Now, you find me information, useful information,
translation.ja: 事件の解決に役立つ情報を早く集めてこい

translation.en: and you will get your 30 pieces of silver.
Or do your friends and sister not need money?
translation.ja: 君たち姉妹はカネが必要だろう？

translation.en: Good. Now you stay there.
translation.ja: 決まりだ 待ってろ　そこを動くな

translation.en: Do not move from that spot.
translation.ja: 待ってろ　そこを動くな

translation.en: Now, the police, they have given us this. It's the information for the other missing babies.
translation.ja: さらわれた赤ん坊の情報を警察からもらった

translation.en: Why us?
-Why'd you pick us to help? -You're from the street.
translation.ja: 選んだ理由は？ 街に詳しい

translation.en: "We're from the street." Yeah, I heard you last time. I know bollocks when I hear it.
translation.ja: そう聞いたけどウソは聞けば分かる

translation.en: [Jessie] You knew itmade monsters out of people. [Alice] …hole in the side of the universe.
translation.ja: あれは人を化け物に変える

translation.en: [Dr. Watson] Something has come to London. A darkness has entered this city.
translation.ja: 闇の悪魔がロンドンの街に紛れ込んだ

translation.en: [Bea] What you doing out here, Jess?
[Jessie] I don't like being stuck in the cellar.
Like you said, they're just bad dreams, right?
translation.ja: あれは ただの夢でしょ

translation.en: I know it's boring, but why don't you put your feet up--
translation.ja: 退屈だろうけど休んで...

translation.en: I just told you why. Stop telling me what to do.
translation.ja: もうイヤだ　命令しないで

translation.en: Can I help you with something?
Nice feather.
It's a raven's feather, right?
How'd you know it was a raven's feather?
Well, um, if you turn it in the light, you'll see it has a blue iridescent hue to it.
translation.ja: 太陽にかざした時青っぽく見えたからだ

translation.en: Others of the Corvus family like crows tend to have a more verdant sheen.
translation.ja: 普通のカラスだと緑っぽく見える

translation.en: May I ask where you acquired it?
I found it. In the street.
Without wishing to cause any offense, I find the chances of that extremely unlikely.
translation.ja: 申し訳ないけどそれはウソじゃないかな

translation.en: And, pray tell, why do you think that?
translation.ja: そう思う理由を教えて

translation.en: Well, Corvus corax are mainly found to the north and west of England. And Scotland.
translation.ja: ワタリガラスの生息地は主にイングランド北部だ

translation.en: It's highly unlikely there are any wild unkindnesses here in London. "Unkindness" is the collective noun.
translation.ja: 野生のワタリガラスがロンドンにいる可能性は低い

translation.en: -A collective noun is-- -I know what a collective noun is.
translation.ja: つまり... もう分かった

translation.en: Of course. Sorry.
My name's Leop…
Just Leo.
Well, "Just Leo," you know a disturbing amount about birds.
translation.ja: レオ あなたは恐ろしく鳥に詳しいのね

translation.en: I read a lot of books.
I mean, it's all I do, really.
translation.ja: 毎日 本ばかり読んでる

translation.en: What are you reading?
We, uh…
I don't know. I don't know actually what I'm reading.
translation.ja: 正直 私もよく分からない

translation.en: -Sounds intriguing. -Yeah, well, it's certainly that.
translation.ja: 面白そうだ まあ そうね

translation.en: My friends and I are involved in an investigation.
translation.ja: 友達と一緒にある事件を調べてるの

translation.en: What kind of investigation?
Four babies have gone missing.
Gosh. That's awful.
translation.ja: それは ひどい話だね

translation.en: May I?
Well, I'm not sure I'd be much use, but perhaps another perspective could help?
translation.ja: 第三者の視点が役に立つ場合もある

translation.en: -Interesting. -Yeah.
All four babies are female, all taken on consecutive dates.
translation.ja: 女の子の赤ちゃんが４日連続でさらわれた

translation.en: Interesting. The most striking thing is they all appear to be born on the same day.
translation.ja: ４人とも同じ日に生まれてる

translation.en: Further, given the addresses, they were probably all born at the same hospital. The St. Mary's, near Paddington.
translation.ja: それに生まれた場所は全員 セントメリー病院だ

translation.en: If you're able to find the other babies born on that day, in that hospital, you might be able to stop it from happening again.
translation.ja: 同じ境遇の子がいるなら悪の手から救えるかもね

translation.en: Marylebone Town Hall keep all the birth certificates of that parish. It's just around the corner on Gloucester Place.
translation.ja: 市役所なら出生届を保管してるはずだ

translation.en: I… Was that of any help at all?
translation.ja: 少しは役に立ったかな？

translation.en: I could escort you to the Town Hall, if you'd like.
What are you?
Sorry? How do you mean?
translation.ja: それは どういう意味？

translation.en: -Who is he? -[Bea] Hmm?
Who?
Oh, Leo.
Just some lad.
He said he works for his uncle near Kings Cross.
translation.ja: キングクロスで親戚の仕事を手伝ってる

translation.en: -Does deliveries for him. -[Jessie] I like him.
translation.ja: キングクロスで親戚の仕事を手伝ってる 気に入った　魅力的ね

translation.en: He's tasty.
translation.ja: 気に入った　魅力的ね

translation.en: Oh, I don't.
-Yeah, but you hate posh people. -I don't hate posh people.
translation.ja: すぐ嫌う そうじゃない

translation.en: You're like a racist against posh people.
translation.ja: 上流階級の逆差別だわ

translation.en: It's not posh people's fault they're posh. Like it's not our fault we're common.
translation.ja: 生まれる家を選べる人はいないのに

translation.en: [whispers] I don't hate posh people.
Yeah, keep repeating that. It makes it loads more believable.
translation.ja: 必死すぎてウソっぽい

translation.en: Who cares who he is?
He's smart.
Very smart.
And if he can help us with the case, then I don't care what his story is.
translation.ja: 今は事件の解決が最優先よ

translation.en: Can I help you?
Madame, have you ever heard of a woman named Edna Skiffins? Ugh!
translation.ja: エドナ･スキフィンズをご存じですか？

translation.en: Edna Skiffins. Where to start…
translation.ja: 最初から話しましょう

translation.en: Chaps!
Chaps! Chaps.
translation.ja: みんな 見て 出生届の記録が見つかった

translation.en: I found the birth register for St. Mary's.
translation.ja: 出生届の記録が見つかった

translation.en: Six girls were born there on the 2nd of October.
Four have already gone missing and one passed away after it was born.
The last one lives at 18 Persimmon Mews.
translation.ja: 残る１人はパーシモン街に

translation.en: Then that's where we need to go.
Beatrice… there is something I feel I need to say.
translation.ja: ビアトリス １ついいかな

translation.en: I have to put forward the thesis that it's unlikely this is a natural phenomenon.
translation.ja: 鳥が自発的に人間を襲ったとは考えにくい

translation.en: I think there's human design at play here.
What's he saying, Bea?
He's saying that someone's controlling the birds.
[Spike] Guys. I ain't coming.
Think about what you're doing. A girl is dead.
translation.ja: よく考えろあの子は殺された

translation.en: Not just dead. Her frigging eyes were pulled out of her face!
translation.ja: 鳥に目をくり抜かれたんだぞ

translation.en: And you wanna go play at being cops?
translation.ja: 警察ごっこは終わりだ

translation.en: If you had a brain cell between you, you'd walk away.
translation.ja: 深追いすべきじゃない

translation.en: That's fine.
Jessie, go back to the cellar with him.
translation.ja: ジェシーも一緒に帰って

translation.en: What? No, I'm coming with you. I want to help.
translation.ja: イヤよ　手伝いたい

translation.en: No, you're not. Go and put your feet up for a bit.
You can't keep me cooped up all day 'cause you're worried something might happen to me.
translation.ja: 心配だからって地下に閉じ込めないで

translation.en: Tell her, Billy.
She's right, Jess.
-Tonight could be dangerous. -We're not asking you, we're telling you.
translation.ja: 今日は危ない これは命令よ

translation.en: You're telling me?
You're not my mum, Bea. Why can't I come?
-[Bea] Because-- -Because what?
Because you're a mess, Jessie! Because you're falling to pieces.
translation.ja: あんたは混乱して壊れかけてる

translation.en: And… and yes.
I'm worried about you.
We're all worried about you.
You walked in front of a horse, Jessie. You're lucky to be alive.
translation.ja: 馬車の前に飛び出して死ぬところだったのよ

translation.en: I don't want you getting hurt. I…
I can't risk it.
I can't risk losing you as well.
translation.ja: あんたまで失いたくない

translation.en: You think I'm crazy like Mum. You all do.
translation.ja: ママみたいに頭が変だと思ってたのね

translation.en: I'm just a burden to you all, aren't I? Just someone you have to look after.
translation.ja: 迷惑ばかりかけて私は お荷物ね

translation.en: Jessie.
No… No!
Jess. Jess!
Look, no one is saying you're crazy. No one is saying that. All right? Everyone's just freaking out…
translation.ja: 頭が変なんて思わないただ心配なんだ

translation.en: [Bea] This is it. 18 Persimmon Mews.
translation.ja: ここで間違いないわね

translation.en: The baby's gonna be asleep. So, just switch it for the decoy and get out of there.
translation.ja: 寝てる赤ん坊をおとりとすり替えて

translation.en: Is this supposed to look like a baby?
We've got limited resources.
-It's moronic. -It's fine.
No, no, no, no.
You're supposed to be asleep.
Okay.
Uh, look… I'm gonna have to pick you up.
translation.ja: 今から抱っこするからね

translation.en: -Please, stop crying. -[crying continues]
[woman] Shush, sweetheart! Mommy's coming! Coming!
translation.ja: 待ってちょうだいママが行くわ

translation.en: [woman] I can't… I can't open the door!
[woman] Dave, come up here!
[woman] Dave, I can't get in there!
[Billy] No, no, no, no.
[Bea] It's got her!
It's just a dream. It's just a dream. It can't hurt me.
translation.ja: ただの夢よ　怖くない

translation.en: Jessie?
-[choking] -Jessie!
It's him.
Hand over the baby now or I'll beat the crap out of you.
This is my baby.
She's mine!
[Spike] No.
-[choking] -No, no, no.
Jessie! Wake up!
-[choking] -Jessie, please breathe.
Hi.
-It's okay, it's okay, it's okay! -[panting]
translation.ja: 大丈夫　怖がらないで

translation.en: I'm not a murderer or anything like that.
translation.ja: 私は人を殺したりしない

translation.en: I know this is extremely weird, but I promise you, you are safe here.
translation.ja: 信じられないだろうがここにいる限り 君は安全だ

translation.en: And I promise you, I'm not a murderer.
translation.ja: もう一度言おう私は人を殺さない

translation.en: -Repeat, not a murderer. -Stop saying that!
translation.ja: もう一度言おう私は人を殺さない やめて

translation.en: Okay.
Where am I?
Well, technically, you're not really here, just your mind is.
translation.ja: 君自身ではなく君の心がいる場所だ

translation.en: Where am I?
You're in Louisiana.
-Why did he think the baby was his? -'Cause he's crazy.
No, it's too easy just to think that people are crazy.
translation.ja: “イカれてる”で済む問題じゃない

translation.en: We're missing something that…
He lost his baby. He lost his little girl.
translation.ja: 彼は大事な娘さんを失った

translation.en: He's looking for her. He won't stop until he finds her. Until he…
translation.ja: その子を探してる見つかるまでずっと...

translation.en: The sixth baby. The one that passed the day it was born. Show me the details.
translation.ja: あの日 亡くなった赤ん坊がいたわね

translation.en: Lenore Hilton. Mother is Angela Hilton. Occupation: laborer.
translation.ja: レノア･ヒルトン母のアンジェラは労働者

translation.en: Father is Arthur Hilton. Occupation…
translation.ja: 父 アーサーの職業は...

translation.en: Head Ornithologist, London Zoo.
translation.ja: ロンドン動物園の鳥類学者

translation.en: Got the bastard.
I swear, I'm your friend.
translation.ja: 神に誓って 私は君の味方だ

translation.en: And right now, correct me if I'm wrong, you need all the friends you can get.
translation.ja: そして私が正しければ君は味方が必要なはずだ

translation.en: Where were you just now?
Before I brought you here?
-I was in a nightmare. -Mmm-hmm.
[shakily] I have these nightmares where I get trapped in these tunnels in hell.
translation.ja: 地獄のトンネルから抜け出せない夢で

translation.en: And there was this thing, this dark thing with a mask and…
translation.ja: 仮面をつけた闇の存在が...

translation.en: I can't hold you here much longer. We don't have much time.
translation.ja: もう時間がないようだ

translation.en: Your friends seek a man who can control the birds, right?
translation.ja: 君の友人は鳥を操る男を捜してるね

translation.en: He's a man of the living world, a normal man. This man has obtained great powers,
translation.ja: 彼は普通の人間だったが強大なパワーを手にした

translation.en: and I need you to find out for me where he got those powers from. Can you do that for me, Jessica?
translation.ja: どこでパワーを得たか調べてくれないか？

translation.en: How?
If you touch him on the arm, like this…
translation.ja: こうして彼の腕に触れると⸺

translation.en: you will enter his mind.
[Jessie] No!
I… I can't.
You are awakening.
-Just like I did. -I don't want this.
translation.ja: 私のように 必要ない

translation.en: If you want these nightmares to stop, then you must remember,
translation.ja: 悪夢を見たくなければ覚えておきなさい

translation.en: what you thought was madness…
translation.ja: 君はイカれてなどない

translation.en: is power.
We need to find the others.
[Leopold] Here it is.
The largest aviary in Europe.
Vulture, the ravens, I knew they had to come from somewhere.
translation.ja: ワタリガラスを操れるとしたら⸺

translation.en: This is him.
It has to be him.
Where are the birds?
Out stealing babies?
You've come for my babies.
You shouldn't have. And now I'm gonna have to hurt you.
translation.ja: 君たちを傷つけるしかなくなった

translation.en: You're trying to stop me finding my baby.
Your baby's dead, Arthur. She died at the hospital, the day she was born.
translation.ja: 娘さんは生まれた日に病院で亡くなったのよ

translation.en: No. Someone took her and they swapped her!
translation.ja: 違う　誰かにさらわれて売られたんだ

translation.en: What's he doing?
I've been too subtle in my method.
translation.ja: 鳥舎の鳥じゃダメなら

translation.en: Why not all the birds in London? Why not all the birds in England?
translation.ja: この国の鳥を全部集めて娘を捜してみせる

translation.en: Close the doors!
I will find her if I have to take every baby in London!
translation.ja: ロンドン中の赤ん坊をさらってやる

translation.en: Jess!
Go!
-I have to go over to him, Bea. -What do you mean? Why?
translation.ja: 彼に会いに来た どういう意味？

translation.en: I don't have time to explain. I have to touch him.
translation.ja: 彼に触れないといけないの

translation.en: -What? No! -Please, Bea.
translation.ja: ダメよ お願いよ　私を信じて

translation.en: For once, you have to trust me.
translation.ja: お願いよ　私を信じて

translation.en: [Bea] Jess!
What's going on?
Where are we?
We're in your memories, Arthur.
The day your daughter passed.
No.
She's not dead. Someone took her.
translation.ja: 娘は死んでない　さらわれた

translation.en: Look.
Where's the baby? My little girl, I want to see her.
translation.ja: 娘はどこだ？　会わせてくれ

translation.en: I'm afraid that's not possible. We already took the body down to the morgue.
translation.ja: 残念ですが ご遺体は安置所に運ばれました

translation.en: -She's my baby! I want to see her! -No.
translation.ja: 私の娘だ　会わせてくれ

translation.en: It was too painful for you to remember, so you made yourself forget.
translation.ja: つらすぎて記憶から消したのね

translation.en: I just wanted to say goodbye.
They should have let you. I'm so sorry.
translation.ja: 本当に残念だったわね

translation.en: Arthur, I need to see how you got your powers.
translation.ja: どこでパワーを得たの？

translation.en: [Arthur] Angie?
You here, my love?
I need help.
I need help finding our baby.
[The Bird Master] I never believed it would really work. I just needed to do something.
translation.ja: まさか祈りが通じるとは思ってなかった

translation.en: And something did happen.
translation.ja: その時 何かが起きた

translation.en: I could feel a power building.
translation.ja: 体の中にパワーが宿るのを感じた

translation.en: I could feel myself changing.
I could feel it coursing through me.
translation.ja: 力が全身にみなぎった

translation.en: Where did it come from?
I don't know.
I'm sorry.
I'm so sorry.
Hiya, beautiful.
Jessie…
what did you do?
Can we go home now?
Leo?
No sign of posh boy then, I take it?
Or do your friends and sister not need money?
translation.ja: 君たち姉妹はカネが必要だろう？

translation.en: [Billy] Bumble?
Open the door! I know you're in!
translation.ja: 開けて　いるんでしょ？

translation.en: [Dr. Watson] No, I won't let you… I won't let you do this again! -[glass crashes] -Stop! [grunts]
translation.ja: ダメだ　もう逃がさないぞ

translation.en: [grunts] Don't come back, then! Goddamn you, don't you ever come back here! [breathing heavily]
translation.ja: そうやって逃げるなら二度と戻ってくるな

translation.en: How did you get in here?
The door was open.
I suppose you came for your money.
You'll be pleased to hear all the babies were returned to their homes.
translation.ja: 赤ん坊は全員 無事だった

translation.en: Arthur Hilton will spend the rest of his days in Bedlam.
translation.ja: アーサーは精神病院に入った

translation.en: He's lucky the British legal system isn't au fait with the supernatural.
translation.ja: イギリス司法が超常現象に精通してたら

translation.en: He'd be swinging from a noose.
How did you know the girl that I hang around with is my sister?
translation.ja: あの子が私の妹だと知ってたのね

translation.en: Tell me, or you'll never see any of us again.
translation.ja: 話さないなら二度と協力しない

translation.en: And I think you need us. I think you need my sister.
translation.ja: 私たちが...妹が必要なんでしょ？

translation.en: Your sister has a gift.
She can see things normal people cannot.
translation.ja: 見えないものが見える

translation.en: How did you know she was gifted?
When you've spent a lifetime fighting demons, you get to learn how to spot an angel.
translation.ja: 長年 悪魔と戦ってるから天使を見分けられる

translation.en: Is everything all right?
Yeah. Just getting our money.
translation.ja: うん お金をもらった

translation.en: [Dr. Watson] Something has come to London, girl. A darkness has entered this city.
translation.ja: 闇の悪魔がロンドンの街に紛れ込んだ

translation.en: You think you've known horror these last few days?
translation.ja: この数日で知った気になるな

translation.en: You know nothing of what it is to be afraid.
translation.ja: 君は何も分かっちゃいない

translation.en: Don't go far.
This is just the beginning.
